title: Heroes of Pelican Town
author: wwLemon
summary: Aizawa just wants the class' trip to the mall to go smoothly, so of course a quirk accident sends two of his students to a different world.Instead of fining a realm on the brink of destruction or being tasked with defeating a demon king, Midoriya and Jiro find themselves in a small town, inheriting a farm and not having to fight for their lives on a constant basis.
tags: Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead is So Done
Midoriya and Jiro get to be teenagers
and not fight for their lives every week
My readers can have just a bit of angst
